meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amy Ramsay Siddharth Hariharan Scott Bateman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7359.

td.p: Amy Ramsay, a program director from Medford, Massachusetts
Siddharth Hariharan, a student from Herndon, Virginia
Scott Bateman, a filmmaker and author from Beacon, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,001)

tr.td: ENTERTAINING REDHEADS
SCANDINAVIA
LUCK OF THE DRAW
IN EXPLICABLE
(Alex: Each correct response will be formed from letters in the word "explicable".)
I'M HERE TO SEE HERBERT HOOVER
STATE YOUR BUSINESS
(Alex: In that last category, we'll give you the business. You tell us in which state it is headquartered.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Hi, I\'m Louis C.K.) I got my big break in 1993 when I became a writer on "Late Night" with this other redhead; I was also the first to do stand-up on his show')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue
